A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi breaks all the conventions of good movie making. It is a terrible Star Wars movie and a terrible movie full stop! You don't build up an entire plot line for half the movie and then abandon it completely prior to The Final Act. And that is just one example of the terrible scripting in the last Jedi. There is so much wrong with this movie I could go on forever. How you go from Looper to The Last Jedi\, I just don't know.
